item.title: Google Code-in 2015!
item.description:
Bonjour le monde! Hello World! 你好世界!

This year is my first year joining Google Code-in, and I look forward to learning many skills for my studies in university next year! This year, I want to specifically improve my participation and contribution to the open source community, and have decided to work with FOSSASIA, a mentoring organisation for this year’s Google Code-in.

This year’s Google Code-in is going to be interesting! I regret not having discovered this amazing and rewarding event earlier! This will also be my last Google Code-in :s
